column2: "Zedekia bedzii hen no nna oedzi mfe eduonu biako; na odzii hen mfe dubiako wɔ Jerusalɛm: na ne na dzin dze Hamutal
column3: Jeremia a ofi Libna ne babaa a."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyiwa do
column3: dɛ mbrɛ Jehoiakim yɛe no nyinara."

column2: "Na ɔnam EWURADZE n'ebufuw do na ɔbaa dɛm wɔ Jerusalɛm na Juda
column3: dze bodur dɛ ɔtoow hɔn fii n'enyim kyenee: na Zedekia tseew Babilɔnhen no do etua."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ n'ahendzi afe a otsia akron no mu no
column3: bosoom a otsia du no
column6: na wɔkyeer do nsera; na wɔtoow aban bɔɔ ho aprɔw tsiaa no."

column2: "Nna wotuaa kurow no kodur ɔhen Zedekia n'afe a otsia dubiako no."
"Bosoom a otsia anan no mu
column3: bosoom no ne nda akron no mu no
column4: ɔkɔm yɛɛ dzendzenndzen wɔ kurow no mu ara
column5: ma wonnyaa edziban biara mma asaase no do nkorɔfo no."

column2: "Nna wotuetuee kurow no ho
column3: na mbarimba akofo no nyina guanguanee fii kurow no mu anadwe dze faa afasu ebien no ntamu
column4: abobow kɛse no a ɔwɔ ɔhen no ture no ho no kɔree; (afei na Kaldeafo etwa kurow no ho ehyia:) na wɔdze faa Araba kwan no do kɔree."

column2: "Na Kaldeafo dɔm no tsiiw ɔhen no
column3: na wɔkɔtoo Zedekia wɔ Jeriko tɛtɛr mu; na no dɔm nyina fii ne nkyɛn petsee."

column2: "Nna wɔkyeer ɔhen no
column3: na wɔdze no kɛmaa Babilɔnhen wɔ Ribla a ɔwɔ Hamat asaase do no; na obuaa no atsɛn."

column2: "Na Babilɔnhen kum Zedekia ne mbabanyin no wɔ n'enyim: okunkum Juda asafohen nyinara so wɔ Ribla."
"Na otutuu Zedekia n'enyiwa; na Babilɔnhen dze no too mpokyerɛ mu
column3: na ɔdze no kɔr Babilɔn
column4: na ɔdze no too efiadze kodur dɛ owui."

column2: "Afei bosoom a otsia enum no mu no
column3: bosoom no ne dadu a ɔyɛ ɔhen Nebukadenezar
column4: Babilɔnhen no n'afe a otsia duakron no mu no
column5: aweɔmfo safohen Nebuzaradan a ogyina Babilɔnhen no n'enyim no

column2: "na ɔhyeew EWURADZE ne fi na ɔhen no ne fi; na Jerusalɛm efi nyinara
column3: ofi kɛse biara mpo na ɔdze ogya hyeew no."

column2: "Na Kaldeafo dɔm a wɔka aweɔmfo safohen no ho nyinara dwuruuw Jerusalɛm afasu no nyina hyiae."
"Nna aweɔmfo safohen Nebuzaradan soaa ɔman no mu ehiafo neminemi no bi kɔr ndɔmmum
column3: na ɔman no mu nkaa a wɔkaa kurow no mu
column4: na awaefo a wɔwaae kɔr Babilɔnhen nkyɛn na nyimpadodow no mu nkaa no."

column2: "Na aweɔmfo safohen Nebuzaradan daan asaase no mu ehiafo neminemi no bi gyae dɛ wɔnyɛ wenyin tureahwɛfo na ekuafo."
"Na boran edum no a ɔwɔ EWURADZE fie no
column3: na ngyinado na boran po a ɔwɔ EWURADZE fie no
column5: na wɔsoaa boran a ɔwɔ ho no nyina kɔr Babilɔn."

column2: "Nsenaba so
column3: na nsofi
column7: na boran nkɔɔpow a wɔdze som nyina

column2: "Na nkɔɔpow
column3: na ogya asɛn
column8: na nkɔɔpow; dza ɔyɛ sika dze no
column12: na aweɔmfo safohen no fae kɔree."

column2: "Edum ebien
column3: po kor no
column4: na boran anantwi duebien a ɔwɔ ngyinado no a ɔhen Solomon yɛe maa EWURADZE fi no n'ase no: nkɔɔpow yinom nyinara no boran no woenntum ennker."

column2: "Na ɔyɛ edum no dze
column3: nkyindur ndua kor no krɔn yɛ basafa akron; na ahoma basafa esia twa ho hyia; na ne peperepee nsatseaba anan: na tu da mu."

column2: "Na ne tsir no boran a; na tsir kor no krɔn yɛ basafa ebien na fa
column3: na atena na pɔmegranate eduaba wɔ tsir no ho hyia
column4: ne nyinara boran a: na nkyindur ndua a otsia ebien no

column2: "Na pɔmegranate ekutu eduokron esia wɔ afa na afa; na pɔmegranate ekutu a ɔwɔ atena no ho hyia nyina yɛ ɔha."
"Na aweɔmfo safohen no faa ɔsɔfopanyin Seraia
column3: na ɔsɔfo edziekyir Zefania

column2: "na kurow no mu na ɔfaa ɔpanyin a wɔdze no sii mbarimba akofo no do; na hɔn a wohun ɔhen no enyim
column3: beesuon a wohun hɔn wɔ kurow no mu no; na ɔsahen ne kyerɛwnyi a ɔpon asaase no do nkorɔfo kɔ ɔsa; na asaase no do nkorɔfo no mu mbarimba eduosia a wohun hɔn kurow no mu no."

column2: "Na aweɔmfo safohen Nebuzaradan faa hɔn
column3: dze hɔn kɛmaa Babilɔnhen wɔ Ribla."

column2: "Na Babilɔnhen bobɔɔ hɔn
column3: na okunkum hɔn wɔ Ribla a ɔwɔ Hamat asaase do no do. Dɛm na wɔfaa Juda ndɔmmum fii n'asaase do kɔree."

column2: "Nkorɔfo a Nebukadenezar soaa hɔn ndɔmmum kɔree no nye woyinom: afe a otsia esuon no mu Judafo mpensa eduonu ebiasa:"
"Nebukadenezar n'afe a otsia duawɔtwe no mu no ɔsoaa nyimpa ahaawɔtwe eduasa ebien ndɔmmum fii Jerusalɛm:"
"Nebukadenezar n'afe a otsia eduonu ebiasa no mu na aweɔmfo safohen Nebuzaradan soaa Judafo ahaesuon eduanan enum ndɔmmum kɔree: nyimpa nyinara wɔyɛ mpemanan ahaesia."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ Judahen Jehoiakin no ndɔmmumkɔ afe a otsia eduasa esuon no mu
column3: bosoom a otsia duebien no mu
column4: bosoom no ne da a otsia eduonu enum no mu
column6: n'ahendzi afe a odzi kan no mu
column7: ɔmaa Judahen Jehoiakin ne tsir do
column8: na oyii no fii efiadze puei;"

column2: "na ɔnye no kasaa kasa pa
column3: na ɔmaa n'akɔngua kyɛɛn ahemfo a wɔnye no wɔ Babilɔn no hɔn akɔngua."

column2: "Na ɔsesaa n'efiadzenda atar no
column3: na odzidzii wɔ n'enyim daa no nkwa nda nyinara."

column2: "Na ɔyɛ n'akɔhomabɔdze no
column3: wɔdze ne daa akɔhomabɔdze no maa no fii Babilɔnhen no ne nkyɛn
column4: da biara n'afamudze wɔ no nkwa nda nyinara mu
